name: cui-requirements
description: Comprehensive standards for requirements and specification documentation in CUI projects, covering project setup, documentation lifecycle, and implementation traceability
author: CUI Development Team

components.name: cui-requirements:requirements-documentation
components.description: Standards for creating and maintaining requirements documents with SMART principles, consistent formatting, and traceability

components.name: cui-requirements:specification-documentation
components.description: Standards for creating specification documents with proper structure, backtracking links, and traceability to requirements

components.name: cui-requirements:project-setup
components.description: Standards for setting up requirements and specification documentation in new CUI projects with proper directory structure and initial documents

components.name: cui-requirements:planning-documentation
components.description: Standards for creating and maintaining project planning documentation with task tracking, status indicators, and traceability to requirements

components.name: cui-requirements:implementation-linkage
components.description: Standards for linking specifications to implementation code and maintaining bidirectional traceability between documentation and source code
